channel.title: Posts on Kha's
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Kha's

item.title: Update all docker images
item.description: Docker does not have a command to update images that you have already pulled in your system by default. Sometimes, we want to update image to latest version because of bugs or vulnerabilities. This action is similar to apt update && apt upgrade in debian-based system.

item.title: Install packages offline on RHEL-based distribution
item.description: Some of my customers have policies to install packages in offline environment. This article summarized useful commands for working with RHEL server.
